medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with metallic pigments
title: Brotherhood of the Three Kingdoms
marks:
Signature and Inscription

Poem signed Baigetsuk {Gototei Kunisada ga }
description: at center of vignette, three figures gathered around a table full of food and drink; figure at R with red skin clutches his long, flowing black beard in his PL hand; figure at center has very pale skin, a shorter beard; figure at LL has bluish skin, exaggerated eyes, a beard, and a big grin; inscription inside vignette; the background is blue with dragons and fire
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
